trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Charlotte
There were no other sightings in Charlotte on or around July 4th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsSaw it moving slowly, realized it was not a plane, too big, thought maybe it was a paper or something from a firework but lasted too long, looked far away and very controlled movement then disappeared. At that point figured it may have been a satellite although really did not look like one. About 10 minutes went by and saw it again, my daughter was with me thankfully because I would have thought I was going crazy if she did not see it also. Took a pic on my phone but it did not turn out well.
